mapper.select: SELECT b.bom_no, b.prod_code, b.bom_wdate, b.bom_udate, b.bom_yn, b.bom_prcs_yn, c.prod_name FROM bom_header b left join com_prod c ON(b.prod_code=c.prod_code) ORDER BY b.bom_no

SELECT b.bom_no, b.prod_code, b.bom_wdate, b.bom_udate, b.bom_yn, b.bom_prcs_yn, find_cdnm('0W', bom_prcs_yn) AS bom_prcs_yn_name, c.prod_name FROM bom_header b join com_prod c ON (b.prod_code=c.prod_code) WHERE c.prod_name LIKE '%' || #{prodName} || '%' ORDER BY b.bom_no

SELECT b.bom_code, b.prcs_code, find_prcs_name(prcs_code) AS prcsName, b.mp_kind, find_cdnm('0X',mp_kind) AS kindName, b.mp_code, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(mp_code, 1, 4) = 'MAT-' THEN m.mat_name WHEN SUBSTR(mp_code, 1, 4) = 'PROD' THEN p.prod_name ELSE b.mp_code END AS mpName, b.bom_unit, b.bom_amt, b.bom_no FROM bom_detail b LEFT JOIN com_mat m ON(b.mp_code = m.mat_code) LEFT JOIN com_prod p ON(b.mp_code = p.prod_code) WHERE b.bom_no = #{bomNo}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO bom_detail ( bom_code, prcs_code, mp_kind, mp_code, bom_unit, bom_amt, bom_no ) VALUES ( get_primarycode('bomCode'), #{prcsCode}, #{mpKind}, #{mpCode}, #{bomUnit}, #{bomAmt}, #{bomNo}
)
mapper.update: UPDATE bom_detail SET prcs_code=#{prcsCode}, mp_kind=#{mpKind}, mp_code=#{mpCode}, bom_unit=#{bomUnit}, bom_amt=#{bomAmt} WHERE bom_code = #{bomCode}
mapper.select: select bom_code, bom_amt from bom_detail where bom_amt >10 order by bom_code
